TopicTitle: Agency color selector larger than viewed area

Articles.Content:
Version 0.1.1.0.21572

OS: Linux via steam

When setting agency colors while creating a new game, the color gradient select area extends past the bottom of the viewable area for the control, probably to the next control.  To see this, click and drag the color circle down vertically.  For example, you won't get to solid black until your mouse pointer is just above the "Set Agency Colors" button.  You can move it around in this area and see changes in the color.
